definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正進一步開展細胞遺傳和育種利用研究。

sentences.english: Tanggu(Tianjing)is the area of the greatest land subsidence in China nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 天津塘沽區是我國目前年沉降量最大的地區。

sentences.english: For now, let others help you be successful.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前，讓別人幫助你成功吧。

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他與太太得靈及他們的2個孩子目前旅居在德國。

sentences.english: As for whether he will visit the DPRK, I am not aware of such an arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 至於他是否去朝鮮，目前我沒有聽說有這方面的安排。

sentences.english: It's the in-thing to do at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 這是目前最時興的做法了。

sentences.english: We’re learning about the fermentation process.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們在學發酵過程。

sentences.english: Hydrolytic kinetic resolution(HKR) is an effective way for synthesis of chiral epichlorohydrin.
sentences.chinese: 是目前合成手性環氧氯丙烷的有效方法。

sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前鍍鋅廠將被刪除，將在其位置上興建的六輥軋機。

sentences.english: At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，醫院繼續採取服務收費的運作模式。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: The company portrays itself as the fastest growing online car-rental agency on earth.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是目前增長速度最快的在線租車代理商。

sentences.english: Yang is still looking for a book publisher.
sentences.chinese: 目前，楊雅晴仍在尋找書的出版商。

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三層樓下還有多少倖存者目前還不得而知。

sentences.english: No data are available to support a correlation between RGV and adverse event rates.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚無數據說明RGV與不良事件率之間的聯繫。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
